titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Maggie Schreiner

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-07-31T16:20-0400

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Robert F. Eckersdorff was president of the IBPAT, Local 490 (Paperhangers).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Materials found in repository; provenance is uknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.260.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains papers documenting his role as president of the union and the history of the union itself. Documents include correspondence with congressmen, The Paperhanger (newsletter of Local 490), a history of the paperhangers union, newspaper clippings, election leaflets, writings of Eckersdorff for the union, and photographs.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Robert Eckersdorff Papers; WAG 014; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Due to the wide date range of materials in this collection, some materials are currently in the public domain, while others are expected to enter the public domain in 2058. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.
